title: Kamala Harris’ Historic DNC Speech: Warns Against ‘Unserious Man’ Donald Trump’s Return As President | Hindustan Times
text: Explore Search Friday, Aug 23, 2024 New Delhi o C Subscribe Games E-Paper Sign in My Account Home HT Premium Loan ₹ 10 Lakh Games & Puzzles Real Estate Powered by India World HTCity Entertainment Trending Astrology Lifestyle Education Business Cities Latest News Shop Now Videos Photos Web Stories Sports Delhi News Mumbai News Bengaluru News Technology Quickreads Daily Digest Following Games + 2 more Following Games Kamala Harris’ Historic DNC Speech: Warns Against ‘Unserious Man’ Donald Trump’s Return As President videos Published on Aug 23, 2024 10:17 AM IST Follow Us Follow Us Share Via Copy Link U.S. Democratic Presidential Nominee Kamala Harris made a stunning speech at the Democratic National Convention. In her speech, Harris warned against ‘unserious man’ Donald Trump’s return as President. Watch her full speech as she attacks her Republican rival here.
